# DuelingBookEnhanced

Goals

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Problem we're trying to solve:

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    [Everything on DuelingBook (DB) you have to mouse over to open a menu to click an option to then open another menu, it's slow as fuck](https://imgur.com/a/PImsaV0)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Ideally we solve it with a combination of Hotkeys

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    give DB more options so it's faster to play

* * * * *

![](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-B-HVitWbxY7dXF_IrG9N9WhretMHk-XRaKSSRccq61dVl8yvyP0-Vc-k4irm_3Q2yzZfli6j6KYtK1ncTmRwFvtH2g_22_PqWgZyiQ0WnJTVpl3KHp2MG4_6IDTueCOMPLmq0gNuKEtzlCwBzfV3zI)

UI Features

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Fast View Extra Deck (the pile with the 15 on it)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Fast View Deck (the pile with 38 on it)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Fast View Graveyard (the 0 pile above the Deck)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Fast View Banished Cards (0 above GY)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Fast Thumbs up (the tiny green thumb up bottom mid right)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Fast Think (the tiny ass think emoji next to text on mid right)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Text Focus![](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/8tDrDcj3hKx73-IWaYgqwGfU5glEZIsVqroq5ZKWZ6aXqv_-PcmnKFEqSmq9IBU0KK2xED-nyx_2z2yk50qKIQQrRHQBP1pvlRXHoZmqVY6wLp68oCuVqg1HTiVL3CSKVFwycquK-W3o6i8RQQZZVck)

![](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/M0Uv-WKbwTc3noRqFvhw6dAQPBdTebRaBHd5CQgUw90fVg1OQ7f3XFt_GlCT609_HmdUTks3V20tS335uMw9f2PLPdVfXw6iGtKCJg9BIKPd7l0JwE7w-J1vlDvSnk6v8bBAeaE1M0prkYJ7mDh3C-4)

Card Features

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Customizable hotkeys for menu options

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Main options to use

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Declare, To S/T, Banish/BanishFD, To Graveyard, SS DEF, SS ATK, Set, NS

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Ideal use cases?

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Mouseover a card -> press "D" key, it does Declare menu command

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Targeting - Mouseover a card, click "T", it does targeting animation AND types in chat "target [card name]

* * * * *

Streamline Commands Features

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Ideal use case?![](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/6DPx38xoLviQz16dwRb3kcBOzjmi0CGw4RAwp2doxhjSBTUFOyaDLmStlweZ4LbgZDWwlUtWkQqLkwXKDMfvdE6e9ruxMVzF1DP6iRuTW-Dva3Na_pJQPDPcClRrYpvkXqUQ4PK7-czu4WVg7-uQ-ZE)

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    User hits "A", it puts "/add" into the text and focuses text

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Then user can type the # they want for adding life points

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Example of use:

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    A -> 500 -> enter key

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    ![](https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/wlmNVw4P--WQolhJDtO_9GziI7apmcMnQ4C_8day9w9K7eyxvxhnGaIPYm2w6IqwXVNH9LY4p330xX9iqD9rJaI6nHOL9_uxuOQJlA45rjQbVqlWE17-Of_XjogudOdmqiiVRZ-GxvfAldNA11rlBH4)Â 

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    This also exists in the middle

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    You type LP you want to gain/lose, click - to change to +, hit enter

-   ![unchecked](data:image/png;base64,)

    Main problem is having to click shit
